title: Implement Zod for runtime type validation
description: Manual type guards in src/app/api/refine-recipe/route.ts (lines 18-62, ~45 lines) duplicate TypeScript types. Use Zod for runtime validation providing single source of truth, better error messages, and reduced code.

title: Extract AI prompt duplication to shared constants
description: ~200 lines of AI prompt text duplicated between src/app/api/generate-recipe/route.ts (lines 99-247) and src/app/api/refine-recipe/route.ts (lines 102-149). Includes ingredient formatting rules, unit validation, meat-category guidance, and recipe interface. Extract to src/lib/prompts/recipePrompts.ts for single source of truth.

title: Create generic useSupabaseMutation hook
description: Mutation hooks (useRecipesMutations.ts, useWeeklyPlanMutations.ts, useGroceryListMutations.ts) repeat the same loading/error handling pattern (~200 lines total). Create generic useSupabaseMutation hook to DRY up the pattern and improve maintainability.

title: Consolidate model configuration (admin.ts + models.ts)
description: ADMIN_MODEL_OPTIONS in src/lib/admin.ts (lines 11-26) and ADMIN_ALLOWED_MODELS in src/lib/openrouter/models.ts (lines 43-58) contain the same model list. This must be manually kept in sync and is prone to drift. Create single source of truth for model configuration.

title: Create reusable FaqSection component
description: FAQ sections duplicated across 3 landing pages (meal-planner, grocery-list-maker, ai-recipe-generator). Same structure (~27 lines each), different content. Create FaqSection component to DRY up and maintain consistent styling.

title: Fix realtime hook useEffect dependencies
description: Realtime hooks (useRecipesRealtime.ts line 130, useWeeklyPlanRealtime.ts line 116, useGroceryListRealtime.ts line 121) include stable Zustand setters in useEffect dependencies. Use useCallback to memoize or exclude stable setters to prevent unnecessary effect re-runs.

title: Code Base Review
description: Review the code base and figure out anywhere where we can do refactoring to make it more efficient or reduce the amount of code needed. And maybe figure out if there is any unused code throughout the code base.

title: Refactor RecipeGenerator component (1,460 lines)
description: RecipeGenerator.tsx is 1,460 lines with too many responsibilities: form state (22+ useState), API calls, rate limiting, UI rendering, animations. Split into smaller components: RecipeGeneratorForm, RecipeResult, RateLimitIndicator, StepCard. Use useReducer for form state. Extract step navigation to custom hook.

title: Extract servings validation to utility function
description: Servings validation logic duplicated 3 times in RecipeGenerator.tsx (lines 202-209, 330-334, 362-366). Extract to validateServings() utility function for maintainability.

title: Implement Admin AI Model Selection
description: When getting ready to submit a recipe generation, I want to be able to choose the model as an admin, but hide this model selection for anybody that's not an admin.

title: Optimize grocery list mutations (reduce fetches)
description: Grocery list mutations in useGroceryListMutations.ts fetch entire list before updates (lines 57-64, 147-154, 375-382). Inefficient for large lists. Use Supabase upsert with onConflict to reduce database queries and improve performance.

title: Add model re-selection on regenerate
description: Allow admins to change the AI model selection in the recipe result view and use that updated selection when regenerating. Implemented with a dropdown in the result view that shows which model was used and allows changing it before clicking Regenerate.

title: Delete unused store.ts file
description: Remove src/lib/store.ts which is completely unused. This is an empty deprecated Zustand store marked 'Deprecated: State moved to React Query'. No imports found anywhere in codebase. Safe to delete entirely.

title: Consolidate admin bypass logic
description: Admin bypass logic duplicated in src/lib/usage.ts (lines 63-76 and 168-204). Create isAdminUser() and getAdminUsageResponse() helper functions to centralize admin logic and reduce duplication.

title: Verify and remove unused components
description: Verify if ContactForm (only in /contact page) and RecipeSelector (no imports found) are actually used. ContactForm has TODO comment about future Resend API integration. Remove if not linked in navigation or genuinely unused.
